This is a suicidal technique which is done when the user covers their torso with [[explosive tag]]s and detonates themselves while in range of the enemy.

== Trivia ==
* The term {{translation|"Tenchū"|天誅}} was a popular term used by the [[Wikipedia:Four Hitokiri of the Bakumatsu|Four Hitokiri of the Bakumatsu]], assassins who believed in "heavenly punishment" against those who supported the Shogunate and foreign access to Japan.
* When Hana Kaka used this technique, she placed the explosive tags onto the corpse of an ally instead of herself, creating a decoy to fake her death.
